which is entirely impersonal entirely
devoted to Supreme entirely at the
service of the whole brotherhood
the coming battle is no battle for
conquest of the South that is over in
past unless the disciple lose his
footing and fall from his place
the battlefield oil which now takes its
place is not that in which the souls of
men struggle with the animal part that
would control them know that on which
the spirits of Man fight with their own
ambitious Natures it is the arena in
which the spirit of the race the
indivisible Spirit of humanity fights
for the final Conquest that shall raise
it to the highest estate for Jews
destined
sooner or later this battle must be won
the warrior is incapable of defeat
but it is a task of the adepts and Life
to shorten the bitterness of the way and
hasten the Great Day of Victory
the song of life is heard only when the
Adept is able to enter upon the great
impersonal effort then the Mystic Beauty
and Harmony of the whole is made plain
to him and the discords which have
oppressed him while he is still only in
possession of the apprehension of man
disappears
the pain and darkness and confusion of
mortal life arise entirely from The
Limited capacity and partial
apprehension of mortal man as he grows
into the immortal condition and
recognizes more and more of that which
surrounds him he becomes capable of
perceiving hitherto invisible forms and
colors and of hearing hitherto inaudible
sounds which make all Discord into
harmony all darkness and Delight all
incompleteness in the perfection
end of chapter end of book
